duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Oracle E-Business Suite projects with a focus on SCM upgrades.
Utilize strong understanding of Supply Chain Management processes and best practices for effective project management.
Implement risk management strategies and problem-solving techniques to overcome project challenges.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective project delivery.
Utilize project management software and tools to streamline project workflows and communication.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Information Technology, or a related field; PMP or other relevant certifications are a plus.
